LATEST: Course Last Updated 10th June 2016

************************************************

Learn the best way to start teaching English online whilst avoid all of the pitfalls that have stopped others. If you want to start a side business teaching English on the internet to others or want to make it your full time job, then this is the course for you. Read on...


+++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • More than 500+ happy students
  • No workbooks, CD's or anything else is required
  • Tons of satisfied students
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

+++++++++++++++++++++++

This course teaches English teachers all about the most important principles that you must think and plan about when it comes to teaching English online. No matter what you need, you should always be aware of pitfalls that will not allow you to be able to achieve the goals that you want for yourself when it comes to teaching English online.

The course covers the following sections:

  • Teaching English Online - General Information
  • Teaching English Online - Common Mistakes
  • Teaching English Online - Resources

There is also a bonus section which deals with teaching English one to one, which can also be a great way to make extra income and more importantly add value to someone's life.

The course is presented in easy to understand terminology and allows students to take their knowledge of English teaching online and in a 1-1 scenario to a higher level of knowledge. The course is presented in a number of videos to cover each of the sections mentioned above. There are also many practical tips all throughout the course which will allow you to take what you are learning in the videos and turn it into real life ideas that you can implement with your students.

To watch the course videos, you will need roughly around three hours. Students are encouraged to take an active role throughout the course, by jotting down notes and actively use the ideas that they get as they are watching the videos in their real life teaching.

If you believe that you are ready to take your English teaching online and one to one teaching to the next level, then this is the course for you. The ideas covered in this course will ensure that you are able to communicate better, more accurately and more in line with what you are trying to teach your students online and in a 1-1 situation.

Hit the "Start Learning Now" button and I'll see you on the inside!
title: How To Turn English Teaching Into An Online Business
